Gotham FC at Washington Spirit Recap 1 Attempt 2
Gotham FC at Washington Spirit Recap Sarah Wardrop 1 Attempt 2 (fingers crossed)

2 Introduction In a second attempt at this minibook (made while troubleshooting an access permission issue), this is a very brief recap of the Gotham FC at Washington Spirit game, and as a result, it is a very mini book. More detail on the game can be found on the Gotham FC site.

3 First Half The score at the end of the first half was 3-0 in favor of Gotham FC, courtesy of a rookie and a veteran: 3’- Sarah Schupansky, assisted by Lilly Reale 32’ – Esther González (penalty kick) 39’ – Esther González, assisted by Sarah Schupansky Schupansky’s goal was her first in the NWSL. Esther continued her impressive season start with her third brace.
4 Second Half There was no change to the score after the first half, with the match ending as a 3-0 win for Gotham FC. Go Bats! :soccer:
